info.title: Searches
info.description: Updated- Provides various search functionalities for artifact repositories including checksum, license, archive entries, latest version, Docker repositories, and more.

get.description: Find all artifacts that have bad or missing client checksum values (md5 or sha1). Searches return file info URIs. Can limit the search to specific repositories (local, remote-cache, or virtual). Requires Artifactory Pro or higher.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of checksum to search for (md5 or sha1)

parameters.name: repos
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of repository keys to limit the search to

clientMd5.description: Client MD5 checksum, empty string if missing

get.description: Search for artifacts that were already tagged with license information and their respective licenses.
Search archive for classes or any other resources within an archive. Can limit search to specific repositories (local or caches).

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the archive entry to search for.

parameters.name: repos
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of repositories to limit the search to.

get.summary: Artifact Latest Version Search Based on Layout
get.description: Search for the latest artifact version by groupId and artifactId, based on the definitions in the Repository Layouts.

parameters.name: g
parameters.description: groupId of the artifact

parameters.name: a
parameters.description: artifactId of the artifact

parameters.name: v
parameters.description: version of the artifact

parameters.name: remote
parameters.description: Whether to include remote repositories in the search (1 to include remote)

parameters.name: repos
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of repositories to limit the search

get.description: Lists all Docker repositories (the registry's _catalog) hosted in an Artifactory Docker repository.

parameters.name: repo-key
parameters.description: Key of the repository

parameters.name: n
parameters.description: Pagination parameter to specify the number of repositories to return

parameters.name: last
parameters.description: Pagination parameter to specify the last repository from previous response

get.description: Returns all artifacts not downloaded since the specified Java epoch in milliseconds. Optionally include only artifacts created before the specified `createdBefore` date, otherwise only artifacts created before `notUsedSince` are returned. Can limit search to specific repositories (local or caches).

parameters.name: notUsedSince
parameters.description: Specified Java epoch in milliseconds.

parameters.name: createdBefore
parameters.description: Artifacts created before the specified date.

parameters.name: repos
parameters.description: Limit search to specific repositories (local or caches).

get.description: Lists all tags of the specified Artifactory Docker repository.

parameters.name: n
parameters.description: Number of consecutive tags

parameters.name: last
parameters.description: Last tag position (numeric) from previous response

get.description: Get all artifacts with specified dates within the given range. Search can be limited to specific repositories (local or caches).

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Start date in milliseconds since the epoch or ISO8601 string value. Mandatory.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: End date in milliseconds since the epoch or ISO8601 string value. If not provided, now() will be used.

parameters.name: repos
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of repository keys.

parameters.name: dateFields
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of date fields to filter by. Supported fields: created, lastModified, lastDownloaded. Mandatory.

get.description: Search for all available artifact versions by GroupId and ArtifactId in local, remote, or virtual repositories.

parameters.name: g
parameters.description: GroupId of the artifact

parameters.name: a
parameters.description: ArtifactId of the artifact

parameters.name: v
parameters.description: Version of the artifact (optional, can accept * and/or ? wildcards)

parameters.name: remote
parameters.description: Set to 1 to include remote repositories in the search (optional)

parameters.name: repos
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of repositories to limit the search (optional)

get.description: Artifact search by checksum (md5, sha1, or sha256). Searches return file info URIs. Can limit search to specific repositories (local, remote-cache or virtual).

parameters.name: md5
parameters.description: MD5 checksum to search for

parameters.name: sha1
parameters.description: SHA1 checksum to search for

parameters.name: sha256
parameters.description: SHA256 checksum to search for

parameters.name: repos
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of repositories to limit the search to

get.description: Get all artifacts matching the given Ant path pattern

parameters.name: pattern
parameters.description: Ant path pattern to search for artifacts

post.description: Flexible and high performance search using Artifactory Query Language.

range.notification: AQL query reached the search hard limit, results are trimmed.

get.description: Artifact search by part of file name. Searches return file info URIs. Can limit search to specific repositories (local or caches). Note: The search must be performed on the actual source repository (local or remote). Virtual repositories are not supported.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Part of the artifact file name

parameters.name: repos
parameters.description: Comma separated list of repository keys

parameters.name: X-Result-Detail
parameters.description: Detail level of the search result (info, properties, both)

get.description: Search by Maven coordinates: GroupId, ArtifactId, Version & Classifier. The search must contain at least one argument. The search can be limited to specific repositories (local and remote-cache).

parameters.name: g
parameters.description: GroupId

parameters.name: a
parameters.description: ArtifactId

parameters.name: v
parameters.description: Version

parameters.name: c
parameters.description: Classifier

parameters.name: repos
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of repositories to search within

parameters.name: specific
parameters.description: Whether to limit the search to specific repositories

parameters.name: X-Result-Detail
parameters.description: To add all extra information of the found artifact

get.description: Search by properties. If no value is specified for a property - assume '*'. Can limit search to specific repositories (local, remote-cache or virtual).
Find all the builds an artifact is a dependency of (where the artifact is included in the build-info dependencies) Requires Artifactory Pro

parameters.name: sha1
parameters.description: sha1Checksum

post.description: Find all the artifacts related to a specific build. Requires Artifactory Pro
Finds all parent manifest lists that include a specific Docker manifest.

parameters.name: repository-name
parameters.description: The repository name

get.description: Get All Artifacts Created in Date Range. If 'to' is not specified use now(). Can limit search to specific repositories (local or remote-cache).

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Start time in javaEpochMillis

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: End time in javaEpochMillis. If not specified, use now()

parameters.name: repos
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of repository keys (local or remote-cache)
